message.entry: Number of filters in the output convolutional layer must be {0} for {1} anchor boxes and {2} classes.
Classes must be specified as a string vector, a cell array of character vectors, or a categorical vector.
Classes must be unique.
Number of anchor boxes must match the number of output layers.
Layer {0} does not exist in the network. Specify a layer name that is part of the network.
YOLO v2 Reorg
YOLO v2 Reorg with stride {0}
yolov2ReorgLayer will be removed in a future release. Use spaceToDepthLayer instead.
Unable to configure the yolov2ReorgLayer to produce an output size of {0} given an input size of {1}.
Invalid layer graph or series network or DAG network.
Multi-channel input is not supported.
Unable to find layer ''{0}''.
Input must be a character vector or a string scalar.
Anchor box dimension {0} must be smaller than or equal to image size {1}.
Input size mismatch. Size of input to this layer {0} is different from the expected input size {1}.
yolov2Layers will be removed in a future release. Use yolov2ObjectDetector API instead.
YOLO v2 Transform Layer with {0} anchors
YOLO v2 Transform Layer
yolov2OutputLayer will be removed in a future release. Use the yolov2ObjectDetector function to create a YOLOv2 object detection network, instead.
Training a YOLO v2 Object Detector for the following object classes:
Training image sizes must be greater than or equal to the input size in image input layer of the network.
NaN values are present in the training loss. The detector may not be properly trained. Try to lower the ''InitialLearnRate'' using the trainingOptions function and retrain the detector.
YOLO v2 transform layer must be connected to the YOLO v2 output layer.

The input to the YOLO v2 transform layer must have {0} channels to support {1} anchor boxes and {2} classes. The number of channels must equal numAnchors * (5 + numClasses). Update the training data, the number of anchor boxes specified in the yolov2Transform layer, or the layers preceding the transform layer.
The yolov2ReorgLayer must produce an output size of {0} for an input dimension of {1} provided in the set of training image sizes.
Network must have an input layer.
Network must have only one input layer.
Input layer of the network must be an image input layer. Use imageInputLayer to create input layer for the network.
Network must have only one transform layer.
Network must have a transform layer. Use yolov2TransformLayer to create the transform layer.
Network must have only one output layer.
Network must have an output layer. Use yolov2OutputLayer to create the output layer.
Output layer of the network must be a yolov2OutputLayer.
The class names specified in the detector must match training data.
Network must not have any fully connected layers.
Network must not have any global pooling layers.
Checking training data...
done.
Detector training complete.
The class names specified in the yolov2OutputLayer must match training data.
Final activations size of layer graph must be greater than [1,1].
TrainingImageSize NVP is not required if detector object is passed to trainYOLOv2ObjectDetector.
Unable to use a detector with batch normalization layers before training is complete. Use trainYOLOv2ObjectDetector to train the detector for one epoch to complete training.
Expected MaxSize to be less than [{0} {1}], which is the ROI size.
Expected MaxSize to be less than [{0} {1}], which is the image size.
The class names must be specified in the yolov2OutputLayer. Use the Classes name-value argument in yolov2OutputLayer to specify the class names.
Starting in R2024b, DAGNetwork objects are not recommended as input to the yolov2ObjectDetector. Use dlnetwork objects, instead.
ReorganizeLayerSource applicable only when DetectionNetworkSource has been specified.
YOLO v2 Output
YOLO v2 Output with {0} anchors
'auto' cannot be set as classes. Try to use different class name.
Layer {0} does not exist in the network. Specify a layer name that is part of the network.
Number of anchor boxes must match number of output layers in pretrained network. {0} expects {1} cell array of anchor boxes.
Height and width of the input must be a multiple of 32 for {0}.
Input network must have convolution layer.
Input size must be a 2 or 3 element vector.
classNames and anchorBoxes must be specified to configure detector for training using DetectionNetworksource or InputSize
Number of channels are different between YOLO v4 deep learning network input and specified input size.
Number of anchor boxes must match number of detection network source layers in custom YOLO v4 with pretrained backbone. Expected {0}-by-1 cell array of anchor boxes.
Training a YOLO v4 Object Detector for the following object classes:
Invalid detector. The detector must be a YOLO v4 object detector.
Invalid options. The options must be a TrainingOptions object.
Invalid training data. The training data must be a datastore object.
Invalid validation data. The validation data must be a combined datastore object.
Training datatype must be any of uint8, uint16, int16, double or single.
Validation datatype must be any of uint8, uint16, int16, double or single.
Number of channels are different between network input and training data.
NaN/Inf has been detected during training. Try reducing the learning rate.
The network predicted invalid bounding boxes during training. Try reducing the learning rate.
Invalid groundtruth. Check that your ground truth boxes are not empty, are real and finite, fully contained within the image boundary, and have positive width and height.
The class names specified in the detector must match the class names in training data.
The class names specified in the detector must match the class names in validation data.
Computing Input Normalization Statistics.
'FreezeSubNetwork' value must be "backbone", "backboneAndNeck", or "none".
Freezing 'backbone' is not supported for YOLO v4 object detector created before MATLAB速 ''R2024a'' or created using the object 'yolov4ObjectDetector(net,classes,aboxes)'.
Freezing 'backboneAndNeck' is not supported for YOLO v4 object detector created before MATLAB速 ''R2024a'' or created using the object 'yolov4ObjectDetector(net,classes,aboxes)'.
Invalid value for 'DetectionNetworkSource' argument. The value must be backbone network layers for creating custom YOLO v4 object detector with pretrained backbone.
Invalid Metric specified in trainingOptions. trainYOLOv4ObjectDetector only supports mAPObjectDetectionMetric.
Number of anchor boxes must match number of output layers in pretrained network. {0} expects {1}-by-1 cell array of anchor boxes.
ROI is not supported when DetectionPreprocessing is set to none.
Input data type must be single or double if DetectionPreprocessing parameter is set to none.
Number of anchor boxes must match number of detection network source layers in custom YOLO v3 with pretrained backbone. Expected {0}-by-1 cell array of anchor boxes.
The input dlX must be a formatted dlarray.
Training a YOLO v3 Object Detector for the following object classes:
Freezing 'backbone' is not supported for YOLO v3 object detector created before MATLAB速 ''R2024a'' or created using the object 'yolov3ObjectDetector(net,classes,aboxes)'.
Freezing 'backboneAndNeck' is not supported for YOLO v3 object detector created before MATLAB速 ''R2024a'' or created using the object 'yolov3ObjectDetector(net,classes,aboxes)'.
Invalid value for 'DetectionNetworkSource' argument. The value must be backbone network layers for creating custom YOLO v3 object detector with pretrained backbone.
Invalid Metric specified in trainingOptions. trainYOLOv3ObjectDetector only supports mAPObjectDetectionMetric.
